org.biojava.nbio.structure.align.multiple

Class BlockImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biojava.nbio.structure.align.multiple.AbstractScoresCache
      • org.biojava.nbio.structure.align.multiple.BlockImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Block, ScoresCache

    public class BlockImpl
extends AbstractScoresCache
implements Serializable, Block, Cloneable
    General implementation of a Block that supports any type of sequential alignment with gaps.
    Since:
    4.1.0
    Author:
    Aleix Lafita
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public int getStartIndex(int str)
        Description copied from interface: Block
        Calculates and returns the first position of the specified structure in the alignment that is not null. This will return the aligment index, not the reisude aligned in that position.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
